Posts.Content: I had an oncotype score of 22.  This is the low intermediate group.  Node negative 1.3 tumor.  Oncologist that with chem it would reduce my risk of reoccurrence by 3%.  Since this is a grey area I am inclined to turn down chemo for 3%.  Is it really worth it to put my body through it.  Decided to do double mastectomy Marie
Posts.Title: Oncotype dx testing and decisions made
